channel.title: TensorFlow on See Hiong's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in TensorFlow on See Hiong's Blog

item.title: Feature Impact on HDB predictions
item.description: In this post, I explore the impact of different feature sets on XGBoost model performance for HDB resale price prediction. By combining numerical, categorical, and engineered features, I conducted a series of experiments and tracked their performance using MLflow. The results reveal how thoughtful feature engineering and selection can significantly influence metrics like RMSE, MAE, and R²—offering valuable insights into building more accurate predictive models.

item.title: MNIST Digit Classifier in TensorFlow
item.description: In this post, I walk through building a simple feedforward neural network using TensorFlow to classify handwritten digits from the MNIST dataset. From data preprocessing to training, evaluation, and visualizing predictions, this hands-on project reinforces key deep learning concepts covered in Andrew Ng’s course. The model achieved over 97% accuracy on the test set, and I also explored prediction confidence and misclassified samples. A solid foundation for experimenting with more advanced architectures ahead.
